By Eagle Fierce on Monday, March 11, 2002 - 11:07 pm:

Ummm...alot more than 3 Milkstuff to get all of the mural pieces. The good news is that you don't need to collect all of the mural pieces to complete the mural.

There are two ways to get the mural pieces. One is by finding them (duh), and the other is by obtaining new cards. If one doesn't bother to find any of the free mural pieces, the Shrine mural may still be completed by acquiring all of the cards in the game. It's nice that TECMO gives the window of opportunity to miss a few pieces, as the game is repeatitive enough as is.
